preqs: NUR1101 or NUR1010; and NUR1203 or NUR1102.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR1010, NUR1101} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR1102, NUR1203})
Must be enrolled in course version {0727, 3562, 3892, 3953, 3963, 4506, 4514}

description: Education is a key part of the work of health care professionals through provision of patient, peer and student teaching. Understanding teaching and learning theories and approaches is fundamental to delivering effective teaching. This unit aims to introduce students to teaching and learning for clinical practice. It will explore theory underpinning teaching and learning as well as provide opportunities for skills development in planning and delivering teaching.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
